name: Focus For Me
description: Deep underground 2 players will find themselves in control of a hovercraft. Both players will have to work towards an exit as they navigate through this dark and eerie maze filled with deadly mines. With player 1 in the drivers seat and no headlights they will have to trust in player 2's ability to spot threats and find their way. The only source of light in this maze is in the hands of the 2nd player, player 2 will have to manipulate the hovercraft's spotlight in order to find what lies in wait for them.
